MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Aintree affecting properties in Muir Road and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53am on the 28TH January 2021.
